Author: RetailSlaveNo1
Text: I totally get it. When I see those anorexia recovery posts in progress pics, if their bmi is 15.5+ I seriously don't recognize that they were underweight. It just seems skinny to me and I can see little flaws that I would want to get rid of, which is scary... I like to delude myself that once I reach my gw I'll be done but I know I won't.

Author: Swimming_Elephant
Text: I totally understand that - I watch a lot of Korean pop and sometimes I find myself thinking, man she got fatter. But she's isn't fat by any means - like logically I know this. But the BD in me is telling me, but she is "fatter".   &#x200B;  All I know is opening up with these thoughts with the people around me when I have them has been a great way for me to hear how crazy I am sometimes. Of course you have to be careful, some people may make it worse for you but fortunately the few people I tell this to have been like, yep - you're insane but still love me and tell me that nicely, lol.  It doesn't make everything immediately better but it's helped me at least identify when I'm being illogical about my body or someone else's more easily even if I am being stubborn about how I feel.
